law.catch_line: A stockholder who demands payment for his stock under this subtitle:...
law.text:
A stockholder who demands payment for his stock under this subtitle:
Has no right to receive any dividends or distributions payable to holders of record of that stock on a record date after the close of business on the day as at which fair value is to be determined under § 3-202 of this subtitle; and
Ceases to have any rights of a stockholder with respect to that stock, except the right to receive payment of its fair value.
